actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Executive Comment Requested from White House.
Unfavorable Executive Comment Received From Arms Control & Disarm Agcy.

official_title: A resolution requesting the President to provide to the House of Representatives certain information concerning Soviet Union compliance with various arms control agreements.

summary.text: Requests the President to furnish to the House of Representatives, within 30 days after the adoption of this resolution, a report by the Arms Control and Disarmanent Agency entitled "A Quarter Century of Soviet Compliance Practices Under Arms Control Commitments: 1958-1983 (U)," November 1983. Permits the President when furnishing such report to delete or modify material which will compromise the national security of the United States.

titles.title: A resolution requesting the President to provide to the House of Representatives certain information concerning Soviet Union compliance with various arms control agreements.
